thread.title: Кто виновен в ДТП и какие пункты ПДД нарушены???(c)
thread.title_full: Кто виновен в ДТП и какие пункты ПДД нарушены???(c)

posts.title: Кто виновен в ДТП и какие пункты ПДД нарушены???(c)
posts.text: Кто виновен в ДТП и какие пункты ПДД нарушены???(c) [ Авторское описание ] ДТП произошло 9 сентября 2017 г. в г. Березники Пермский край. По направлению из г.Усолье в г.Брезники. Не доезжая до перекрестка автодороги Усолье-Березники и ул. Новосодовая.Важно учесть, что перед перекрестком на бетонной плите висят знаки: "Препятствие, объезд препятствия справа". Согласно п.9.12 ПДД "На дорогах с двусторонним движением при отсутствии разделительной полосы островки безопасности, тумбы и элементы дорожных сооружений (опоры мостов, путепроводов и тому подобное), находящиеся на середине проезжей части, водитель должен объезжать справа, если знаки и разметка не предписывают иное". Т.е Nissan двигался по главной дороги на полосе предназначенной для движения того направления, в котором двигался.

posts.title: Sky Supersport Ticket für 14,99€ - 50% Rabatt für Neukunden
posts.text:
Sky Supersport Ticket für 14,99€ - 50% Rabatt für Neukunden Sky Supersport Ticket für 14,99€ - 50% Rabatt für Neukunden Steven-M 5 7. November 2017 09:34 
Die Länderspielpause steht vor der Tür, aber der kluge Fußballfan sorgt vor. Wer bisher noch kein Sky-Abo oder Ticket hat, kriegt als Neukunde von Sky aktuell 50% Rabatt auf das Supersport Ticket. Bedeutet: Anstatt der pro Monat fälligen 29,99€ kriegt ihr das Sport-Paket im Buchungs- und Folgemonat für knackige 14,99€. 
Das Angebot gilt nur für Sky Ticket Neukunden. Euch werden im Monat des Vertragsschlusses sowie im Folgemonat für das Sky Supersport Ticket mit dem Gutscheincode PB2017 nur 14,99€ berechnet. Im Anschluss werden 29,99€ pro Monat berechnet. Sky Supersport Ticket 
Mit dem Supersport Ticket stehen euch natürlich jede Menge Sport Events zur Verfügung. Darunter natürlich der Großteil der Bundesliga-Spiele, alle Spiele der Champions und Europa League und auch der DFB Pokal. Die Spiele könnt ihr euch dann einzeln oder in der beliebten Konferenz anschauen. Außerdem gibt es noch Handball, Tennis, Golf und die Formel 1. Da ist für jeden Sport-Enthusiasten was dabei. Das Ticket ist monatlich kündbar, was natürlich eine sehr feine Sache ist und euch flexibel hält. Wie kann ich Sky streamen? 
Sky könnt ihr auf diverse Art empfangen. Zur auswahl stehen euch Smart-TV, PC, Tablet, Smartphone oder die eigene Spielekonsole in Form von Xbox oder Playstation. Ihr seid auf den Geräten an sich also flexibel, was bei Sky über eine lange Zeit nicht der Fall war. Kündigung 
Da es sich hierbei trotzdem um ein Abo handelt, müsst ihr entsprechend kündigen, damit es sich nicht verlängert. Das ist jeweils mit einer Frist von 7 Tagen zum Kalendermonatsende möglich. Wer Neukunde ist und das Angebot wirklich nur über den Zeitraum für 14,99€ haben möchte, sollte sich einen entsprechenden Reminder setzen, damit ihr danach nicht die vollen 29,99€ auf den Tisch legt. Am einfachsten kündigt ihr das Abo dann innerhalbs eures Accounts. Das geht wie folgt: Loggt euch bei Sky Ticket ein Geht auf „Mein Account“ Unter der Übersicht findet ihr „Ticket beenden“ Klickt auf „Ticket beenden“ und folgt den nächsten Schritten Fertig Bundesliga: Borussia Dortmund vs. Bayern München Mit Freunden teilen

posts.text: 1 из 36 на Vaporshark rDNA 40 Всем привет! Мод использовался бережно, сразу же был помещен в чехол от Ёмщика, поэтому покрытие со всех сторон, кроме верхней, сохранилось почти в первозданном виде. Под баком, понятное дело, потертость, но это практически со всеми вапоршарками случается. Педаль газа (кнопка fire) тоже имеет следы эксплуатации. Комплектность: 2. Чехол кожаный от Ёмщика 3. Живая батарейка 18650 - Лыжа шоколадка. Фоточки: 1. Кол-во ставок - 36. Входной билет 120 руб (включает доставку ПР или СДЭК до 250 рублей). 2. Список участников ведется путем подачи заявки в этой же теме (в личку заявка не принимается: все должно быть на виду) и оплаты своей ставки. 3. Оплата принимается на карту Сбера (будет указана после 50% заполненных номеров) . Количество ставок от одного участника не ограничено. 4. Розыгрыш состоится после того как все 36 номеров будут заняты и оплачены. 5. Розыгрыш проводится с помощью «государственной лотереи 5 из 36» , играет тираж следующий после оплаты всех ставок! 6. Доставка по РФ ПР или СДЭК склад-склад входит в стоимость билета. 7. В этой теме Вы оставляете сообщение с номером ставки от 1 до 36 (ставок может быть несколько). Если эти номера еще не заняты (это Вы можете увидеть в "Список") 8.ОПЛАТА ТОЛЬКО ПОСЛЕ ТОГО, КАК НАБЕРЕТСЯ 50% УЧАСТНИКОВ. Вы оплачиваете сумму, соответствующую количеству Ваших ставок и в комментарии к оплате ОБЯЗАТЕЛЬНО указываете свой ник на форуме. Будьте внимательны, денежные средства поступившие без комментария считаются благотворительной помощью и категорически приветствуются. 9. После оплаты статус Ваших ставок меняется на "ОПЛАЧЕНО" 10. Далее мы ждем пока все 36 номеров таблицы будут заняты. 11. После этого я закрываю прием ставок сообщением "СТАВКИ СДЕЛАНЫ, СТАВОК БОЛЬШЕ НЕТ" и сообщаю вам номер следующего (еще не состоявшегося) тиража, с помощью которого мы и выберем победителя - выигрывает 4 выпавший номер 12. В случае если лотерея не состоится ( нет 36 -ти желающих), возврат денег будет производиться на СБЕР. Состояние "не состоялась" лотереи определяется лотерееустроителем. 13. Некоторым участникам может быть отказано в участии без объяснения причины. 14. На усмотрение ТС в случае если до ближайшего тиража остается 1 час и не все номера оплачены, то право выкупа не оплаченных номеров переходит к любому желающему при условии немедленной оплаты, если отсрочка оплаты не оговорена с ТС отдельно в каждом случае. thread.title: Hard luck as Single Gaze hampered in Cup | The Daily Advertiser
thread.title_full: Hard luck as Single Gaze hampered in Cup | The Daily Advertiser

posts.author: Peter Doherty
posts.title: Hard luck as Single Gaze hampered in Cup | The Daily Advertiser
posts.text:
twitter TWEET Single Gaze squeezed between horses in the first couple of hundred metres of the race, with Frankie Dettori on Almandin on her outside. 
The Melbourne Cup dream ended in disappointment for connections of Riverina owned and bred Single Gaze, with the mare pulling up ‘battered and bruised’ following the Flemington feature. 
Gundagai part-owners Martin Hay and David Tout and stable foreman Billy Owen were left trying to balance their pride in the gutsy galloper with the pain of seeing their hopes all-but dashed early, and the anguish of seeing the five-year-old finish up sore. 
“She’s battered and bruised, she got battered from pillar to post,” Hay said at Flemington. 
“We’re still very proud of her, it’s just disappointing for the horse – she deserved a better chance than that.” 
Single Gaze jumped well from barrier 11 but struck trouble inside 200 metres in the two-mile classic. TOUGH RUN: Single Gaze finished 17th in the Melbourne Cup which was won by Rekindling, for jockey Corey Brown, trainer Joe O'Brien and owner Lloyd Williams. Picture: AAP 
Just as she crossed to settle, Single Gaze was forced into runners on her inside, which saw her shuffled back. By the time they passed the post for the first time, she was midfield and it never got any better. 
While Rekindling went on to win for jockey Corey Brown, Kathy O’Hara returned with a tale of woe after finishing 17 th . 
“She was knocked around a lot in the race and never had a lot of luck in running,” O’Hara said. 
“She was brave enough to run past a couple late but it was just too rough for her." 
Single Gaze was reported to be lame in the near foreleg. Single Gaze earlier in the week with part-owner Martin Hay, trainer Nick Olive and foreman Billy Owen. 
“She’s severely knocked about,” Hay said. 
“The horse nearly fell, it could’ve been nasty, but anyway… we’ll let the dust settle and have a good look at her tomorrow.” 
When it does, Hay said they’ll be able to look back on the wonderful ride the little chestnut has taken them on this spring, including a memorable second in the Caulfield Cup. 
“Definitely – it’s phenomenal,” he said. “We’re that proud of her. It’s an achievement that we got here… it’s a horse race, it’s not the end of the world.”

posts.author: 천민지 기자
posts.title: KT, 전파방해에도 끄떡없는 '시간 동기 기술' 개발
posts.text:
KT는 재밍공격에도 안정적인 통신 서비스를 제공하는 'IP 기반의 시간 동기 기술' 개발을 성공했다. 스웨덴 스톡홀름 에릭슨 랩에서 KT와 공동개발한 에릭슨 직원들이 GPS 연출해 ‘IP 기반의 시간 동기 기술’을 테스트 하고 있다. <KT 제공> 
[한국정책신문=천민지 기자] KT(대표 황창규)는 전파방해(재밍, Jamming)에도 안정적인 통신 서비스를 제공하기 위한 '인터넷프로토콜(IP) 기반의 시간 동기 기술' 개발을 성공했다고 7일 밝혔다. 
일반적으로 기지국 간에신뢰도 높은 데이터를 전송하기 위해서는 전송 시간을 맞추는 동기화 과정이 필수다. 이에 일반적인 기지국 장비는 시간 정보를 위치정보시스템(GPS)로부터 받아 시간을 동기화한다. 하지만 장비는 재밍 공격을 받게 되면 GPS 정보를 수신하지 못해, 기반의 통신 서비스는 일시적으로 마비된다. 
KT와 에릭슨이 공동 개발한 이 기술은 GPS 정보가 없어도 기지국간 시간을 동기화 할 수 있다. 이 기술은 장애가 발생했을 때 시간 정보를 유선 네트워크를 통해 'GM(Grand Master) 서버'로부터 받아, 기지국간 시간 오차를 보정하고 통신이 가능하도록

thread.title_full: 5 حيل بسيطة تساعدك على الإقلاع عن التدخين فورًا !

posts.author: wediaz.com (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: 5 حيل بسيطة تساعدك على الإقلاع عن التدخين فورًا !
posts.text:
5 حيل بسيطة تساعدك على الإقلاع عن التدخين فورًا ! اشترك في خدمة "الأخبار العاجلة" واحصل على أحدث وأهم المستجدات لحظة بلحظة: يوم 07 نوفمبر 2017 
التدخين آفة قاتلة وعادة مدمرة بكل ما تحمله الكلمة من معنى؛ لأنه لا يسبب النوبات القلبية والسكتات الدماغية والسرطانات المختلفة فحسب، ولكنه يؤدي إلى اضطرابات الجهاز التنفسي وسرطان الرئة وقرحة الفم وعسر الهضم، وغيرها من الأمراض. 
هنا لابد أن تتسلحي بالإرادة القوية للإقلاع عن هذه العادة السيئة، وتكفيك كل هذه الأمراض لتحمي نفسك من شر أنت في غنى عنه. 
وتطرقت مجلة “بولد سكاي”لهذا الموضوع الشائك وقدمت بعض الحيل البسيطة التي تساعدك في الإقلاع عن التدخين: 
أسألي نفسك أولا لماذا تدخنين؟ وما هو الدافع وراء سعادتك بذلك؟ ستساعدك هذه الخطوة في تحديد مدى حبك للتدخين وتعلقك به، فقد تكون في النهاية عادة سطحية يسهل الاقلاع عنها. 
هناك أوقات بعينها تحتاجين فيها لتدخين السجائر، من هنا تأتي أهمية تحديد وقت التدخين، ومن ثم تلتفتين لنشاط آخر، أو تمارسين هواية مفضلة لتعويد نفسك على عدم التدخين. 
خلصت بعض الدراسات الحديثة إلى أن محاولة الإقلاع عن التدخين لابد أن تحدث في حالة مزاجية جيدة ومعنويات مرتفعة، ما يقلل من أعراض التوتر والاكتئاب وبالتالي تؤتي محاولة الاقلاع عن التدخين بثمارها وتصبح أكثر فعالية. 
ضعي المكسرات والفواكه المجففة كوجبات خفيفة في حقيبتك أينما ذهبت، لأنها تقلل من الرغبة المفرطة في التدخين وتحد منه بشكل ملحوظ.

posts.text:
In this start up guide, we'll explain how to set up a new group in Cura Connect
Cura Connect is compatible with all models of Ultimaker 3
Before you start, make sure your 3D printer is connected to your local network
Cura Connect runs on the firmware of a single host Ultimaker 3D printer
The host delegates jobs to other printers in your group
Every printer you connect directly with Cura will automatically become the host of their
own Cura Connect group
To add a new host, go to the "Add Printer" wizard
Select your Ultimaker 3 printer from the list
We will call this printer "Group-Host"
and select "Add Printer"
A list will open, and all the Ultimaker 3 models connected to your network will be visible
Select your printer and click "Connect"
Navigate to the "Monitor" tab
Here you can view all printers present in the group
This group currently contains one printer
On the right side of the screen, there are two buttons you can use to navigate to the
Cura Connect control screen in the browser
Congratulations!
You have now successfully set up a Cura Connect group
When you are happy with the settings of you group, you are ready to start printing
Note: If you want to have a group of Ultimaker 3 and Ultimaker 3 Extended 3D printers, it

RME Audio TotalMix FX - DSP based Equalizer - Duration: 2:25. In this video we expand on the DSP based Equalizer within TotalMix FX.
In simple terms an equalizer is a special kind of filter for boosting and cutting selected
frequencies throughout the audio spectrum.
TotalMix FX comes equipped with a 3-band parametric equalizer
plus an additional low cut.
While the frequencies of each band can range from 20Hz to 20khz, the
slope of the low cut is adjustable between 20Hz and 500Hz and has a 6dB
to 24dB cut per octave.
All three bands can change their amplification between +20dB to -20dB.
This flexibility is great for shaping instrument tracks, cleaning
out unwanted frequencies or adding punch and definition to entire mixes.
Band 1 and 3 can operate in peak (bell) or shelf (shelving) mode.
The middle band is fixed to peak mode.
Band 3 can also operate as Hi Cut , especially useful for LFE
and subwoofer purposes.
We can narrow or widen the bandwidth by raising or lowering the Q. The higher the Q factor,
the narrower the bandwidth and vice versa.
By clicking on the "Preset" button, the EQ menu will show up.
Several entries give comprehensive options for handling EQ presets.
Besides loading factory settings or resetting the parameters, we
also have 16 slots at our disposal for storing and recalling our own presets.
EQ presets can be imported and exported which is useful if we
want to work in different workspaces or with different
computers.
Note that the menu of all channels is identical.
If an EQ preset is saved, it is then available on all other channels.
We hope you could get a better understanding of the EQ of TotalMix FX.
Please don't hesitate to ask us for support in the comment section
below the video.

thread.title: Anlegerverlag: MorphoSys: Kippt die Aktie durch die Quartalszahlen?
thread.title_full: Anlegerverlag: MorphoSys: Kippt die Aktie durch die Quartalszahlen?

posts.title: Anlegerverlag: MorphoSys: Kippt die Aktie durch die Quartalszahlen?
posts.text:
| 07.11.2017, 10:00 | 272 | 0 | 0 Foto: www.anlegerverlag.de 
MorphoSys (ISIN: DE0006632003) bestätigte im Zuge der heute Früh präsentierten Bilanz zum dritten Quartal die Jahresprognose 2017. Das war etwas, womit man rechnen konnte, aber im Vorfeld dürften doch einige darauf gesetzt haben, dass man ein wenig optimistischer auftreten würde. Immerhin gab es im Verlauf der letzten Monate doch eine Reihe guter Nachrichten, so z.B. diese Anhebung des Status des Antikörpers MOR208 auf „Therapiedurchbruch“ durch die FDA. Aber: 
Das Problem eines Unternehmens, das nach Antikörpern forscht, ist eben, dass es Jahre dauert, bis richtig Geld fließen kann. Man etabliert einen Antikörper, Partner entwickeln komplexe Wirkstoffe, die werden in lange klinische Tests geschickt. Und dann müssen erst einmal Medikamente an den Markt gebracht werden, von deren Verkauf MorphoSys dann seinen Anteil erhielte. Das ist ein Geduldsspiel. Und bis diese Zeit kommt, „verbrennen“ solche Unternehmen eben Geld. Es konnte nicht wundern, dass der Umsatz auch im dritten Quartal niedriger lag als der Verlust. Die Frage ist eben nur, ob die Anleger diese Geduld aufbringen – auf einem derart luftigen Niveau des Kurses und ausgerechnet an einer charttechnischen Widerstandsmarke. Für den Moment, als erste Reaktion auf die Bilanz, lautet die Antwort: 
Offenbar nicht. Sie sehen im Chart, der den Stand der Dinge um 09:30 Uhr zeigt, dass MorphoSys im Vorfeld der Bilanz an das Oktober-Hoch herangelaufen war, jetzt aber kräftig zurücksetzt. Damit stehen die nächstgelegenen Unterstützungen bereits im Feuer: die 20-Tage-Linie bei 75,30 und die steile August-Aufwärtstrendlinie bei 74,10 Euro. Sollten diese Linien halten, bleibt die Chance nach oben erhalten. Wenn nicht, wird es kniffliger. Dann wäre ein Test der darunter liegenden Unterstützungszone 67,75/68,75 Euro drin und, wenn es dick kommt, auch ein Anlauf an die mittelfristigen Supports um 60 Euro. Zu Stunde ist da eine Menge Volatilität in der Aktie, also Vorsicht, was zählt ist nur das, was der Chart heute zum Handelsende „ausspuckt“! 

Der DAX erreicht neue Rekorde! Sie wollen an der Rallye verdienen? Dieser Exklusiv-Report zeigt Ihnen, wie Sie JETZT davon profitieren. Einfach kostenlos herunterladen !

thread.title: GM to pull out of South Africa completely and discontinue Chevrolet sales in India by end of 2017
thread.title_full: GM to pull out of South Africa completely and discontinue Chevrolet sales in India by end of 2017

posts.author: Anthony Lim
posts.title: GM to pull out of South Africa completely and discontinue Chevrolet sales in India by end of 2017
posts.text:
General Motors has announced it is quitting South Africa entirely and will be discontinuing Chevrolet sales in India, both by the end of 2017.
In South Africa, the company will cease sales of Chevrolet brand vehicles and transition its manufacturing operations to Isuzu Motors, selling its Struandale plant in Port Elizabeth as well as its remaining 30% shareholding in the Isuzu Truck South Africa joint venture to Isuzu.
The Japanese company will also purchase GM’s vehicle conversion and distribution centre along with its parts distribution centre. The Chevrolet brand sells the Spark, Cruze, Captiva, Trailblazer and Utility in South Africa.
For the Indian market, the company will refocus its manufacturing operations on producing vehicles only for export, the facility at Talegaon continuing as an export hub for Mexico and Central and South American markets. Though it is stopping sales, it said existing Chevrolet customers will continue to be supported in the market.
The automaker also announced its plans for its other international operations. It will be withdrawing from East Africa, also by the end of this year, and will sell its 57.7% stake in GM East Africa to Isuzu.
It added that its regional headquarters office in Singapore will be streamlined and will be responsible for handling its remaining markets in Australia, New Zealand, India, Korea and Southeast Asia. The automaker said the restructuring of its international operations will result in annual savings of approximately US$100 million.

thread.title_full: Social Media Analyst at PXC Digital

posts.author: Job Informant (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Social Media Analyst at PXC Digital
posts.text: Home PXC Digital Social Media Analyst at PXC Digital 7 November 2017 10:27 Leave a Reply PXC Digital is an imprint of Pixcentric, an organization focused on developing tools that leverage technology to solve problems sustainably, ultimately making life better for people. We are building an organisation steeped in hard work and best practice; with increasing opportunities for individuals who are motivated by an exceptional drive to deliver results. As a result of expanding demand, it has become imperative to fill the following position: Job Title: Social Media Analyst Location: Lagos Mainland Job Overview This position is for individuals who desire to build a career as social media professionals, in a media technology environment. We are looking for smart, savvy, self-driven individuals with great communication skills, willing and able to thrive in our intense, yet, friendly, low supervision culture which values and rewards peak performance. The successful candidates MUST be versatile , have the capacity to study, create content, and intelligibly discuss subjects spanning diverse fields and sectors. Job Description Develop a social strategy that creates buzz, attracts new members, drives community engagement, and ensures that all assigned brands are well-represented on social media. Identify and report new social trends, especially tent poles, and incorporate same into the social engagement plans of assigned brands as appropriate, ensuring the brands remain socially relevant. Provide online/social media funnel support for the assigned brands. Maintain the team’s social media calendar. Maintain accurate and organised documentation on all clients’ projects and communications. Develop, test, measure, deploy and manage content across social media channels for assigned brands. Reach out to editors, and bloggers to arrange guest posts, interviews, vlog contributions etc. Create innovative social programs with cohesive points-of-view, finding new ways to integrate our client’s brick-n-mortar experience into social. Ensure social user feedback is “heard” and incorporated into regular reports for all assigned clients. Key Competencies Proven experience identifying, targeting, and mobilizing relevant opinion leaders (trending and budding), tastemakers and influencers. Strong interest in new media as a tool for communication and development. Excellent verbal and written communication skills (English, others). Great attitude. Good presentation, persuasion, and relationship skills. Proficiency in Microsoft Office. Commitment to rapid professional growth and development. Image manipulation, creative writing, and video manipulation skills are an added advantage. Experience: Minimum of 2years post-NYSC experience in a relevant position (client-side, agency-side or editorial). Suitably qualified candidates with less relevant experience can apply as Trainee Social Media Analysts. Qualification: First degree in any discipline (Second class upper & above only), or HND in any discipline (Distinction only). Possession of a Digital / Social Media Management Certification is an added advantage. How to Apply Interested candidates should forward their current CV to babasolakp@gmail.com stating the desired position in the subject line. Please Share!

thread.title: Στην πλατφόρμα της Trivago και βραχυχρόνιες μισθώσεις ακινήτων-Συνεργασία με τη HomeAway
thread.title_full: Στην πλατφόρμα της Trivago και βραχυχρόνιες μισθώσεις ακινήτων-Συνεργασία με τη HomeAway

posts.author: adiana1
posts.title: Στην πλατφόρμα της Trivago και βραχυχρόνιες μισθώσεις ακινήτων-Συνεργασία με τη HomeAway
posts.text:
ΕΧΕΙ ΚΑΝΕΙ ΔΟΚΙΜΕΣ ΣΕ ΠΕΝΤΕ ΑΓΟΡΕΣ Στην πλατφόρμα της Trivago και βραχυχρόνιες μισθώσεις ακινήτων-Συνεργασία με τη HomeAway Φωτογραφία: Pixabay - A + A 
Στον τομέα των βραχυχρόνιων μισθώσεων, μπαίνει η trivago, η οποία ανακοίνωσε την ενσωμάτωση της HomeAway στην πλατφόρμα αναζήτησης ξενοδοχείων της. 
Η ενσωμάτωση αυτή έχει στόχο να διευρύνει τους τύπους καταλυμάτων που προσφέρονται στην πλατφόρμα και να αυξήσει τις επιλογές για τους χρήστες της trivago. 
Η trivago, η οποία συγκρίνει προσφορές από περισσότερες από 400 ιστοσελίδες κρατήσεων, «συνεχίζει να υποστηρίζει ένα προϊόν παγκόσμιας αναζήτησης και επιθυμεί να επιλύσει τις προκλήσεις της εμπειρίας των χρηστών μέσω της εξατομικευμένης εμπειρίας», αναφέρει χαρακτηριστικά η ανακοίνωση της εταιρείας. 
Από την πλευρά του, ο Johannes Thomas, Managing Director και Διευθυντής Εσόδων της trivago N.V. δήλωσε: «Το ποσοστό των ταξιδιωτών που σκέφτονται να κλείσουν ένα κατάλυμα προς ενοικίαση μεγαλώνει και εμείς το αξιολογούμε αυτό ως μια στρατηγική ευκαιρία για να διευρύνουμε την παροχή των τύπων καταλυμάτων μας. Η παρουσίαση και ξενοδοχείων και καταλυμάτων προς ενοικίαση σε μία και μόνο αναζήτηση αποτελεί πρόκληση από την οπτική γωνία της εμπειρίας των χρηστών.» 
Όπως εξήγησε ο ίδιος: «Δεν θέλουμε να μπερδέψουμε τους χρήστες της trivago που κλείνουν ξενοδοχεία και, γι’ αυτό, η εξατομίκευση της εμπειρίας θα παίξει έναν σημαντικό ρόλο εδώ. Επιθυμούμε να προβάλλουμε καταλύματα προς ενοικίαση μόνο όταν είναι σχετικά για τους χρήστες μας. 
Γι’ αυτό το λόγο, είμαστε πολύ χαρούμενοι για τη νέα συνεργασία μας με τη HomeAway, καθώς αυτό μας επιτρέπει να διευρύνουμε τις δοκιμές μας αναφορικά με το πώς μπορούμε να δημιουργήσουμε μια εμπειρία χρήστη που να είναι πιο εξατομικευμένη σύμφωνα πάντα με τις ανάγκες του.» 
Ο John Kim, Γενικός Διευθυντής (CEO) στη HomeAway, πρόσθεσε: «Πιστεύουμε ότι είναι μια τεράστια ευκαιρία μάρκετινγκ για τη HomeAway. Η εξατομικευμένη προσέγγιση της trivago στην προβολή καταλυμάτων προς ενοικίαση, μάς βοηθάει να στοχεύουμε σε μια άκρως σχετική ομάδα ταξιδιωτών, γι’ αυτό και είμαστε αισιόδοξοι για τη μετατροπή (conversion) στις ιστοσελίδες μας.» 
Η trivago άρχισε να πραγματοποιεί δοκιμές στη Γερμανία, την Ιταλία, τον Καναδά, το Ηνωμένο Βασίλειο και τις Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες- σε πέντε από τις αγορές-κλειδιά της- με πάνω από 200.000 καταλύματα προς ενοικίαση να είναι ήδη διαθέσιμα στους χρήστες. 
Επίσης, έχει στόχο να διαθέσει ακόμα περισσότερα καταλύματα προς ενοικίαση για κράτηση μέσα στο 2018, συμπληρώνοντας την τρέχουσα διαθεσιμότητα ξενοδοχείων της. Όταν ο χρήστης επιλέγει και βάσει της διαθεσιμότητας σε έναν συγκεκριμένο προορισμό, η trivago θα αρχίσει να προβάλλει καταλύματα προς ενοικίαση στα αποτελέσματα αναζήτησής της. Την ίδια στιγμή ένα φίλτρο «Καταλύματα προς ενοικίαση» βρίσκεται υπό δοκιμή, ώστε να επιτρέπει στους χρήστες να παίρνουν συνειδητά την απόφαση να αναζητήσουν τέτοιου είδους καταλύματα. 
Για την trivago, όπως επισημαίνει, το συγκεκριμένο, αποτελεί ένα ακόμα μεγάλο βήμα, ώστε να προσαρμοστεί σε ακόμα πιο διαφορετικές προσδοκίες ταξιδιωτών και να κατανοήσει καλύτερα πώς να προβάλλει τη διαθεσιμότητα καταλυμάτων προς ενοικίαση στην πλατφόρμα της. 
Αυτό θα ανοίξει ένα νέο κανάλι μάρκετινγκ για τέτοιου είδους πλατφόρμες και θα αυξήσει την ποικιλία στις αγορές της trivago, η οποία προσφέρει αυτή την στιγμή πρόσβαση σε περισσότερα από 1,8 εκατομμύρια ξενοδοχεία και άλλα καταλύματα σε πάνω από 190 χώρες.

posts.author: اللويبدة الاخباري (basem.sakijha@gmail.com)
posts.title: مجلس الأمن يناقش التقرير الكيميائي حول سوريا وجدل روسي أمريكي بشأنه
posts.text: العدد 35 Tuesday, 07 November 2017 مجلس الأمن يناقش التقرير الكيميائي حول سوريا وجدل روسي أمريكي بشأنه Tuesday, 07 November 2017 09:20 | | ينظر مجلس الأمن الدولي رسميا عصر اليوم الثلاثاء، في تقرير الخبراء حول الهجمات الكيميائية في خان شيخون وأم حوش وأماكن أخرى، وفي الوقت ذاته، ستظل مسألة تمديد تفويض البعثة المشتركة للأمم المتحدة ومنظمة حظر الأسلحة الكيميائية للتحقيق في استخدامها في سوريا موضع خلاف بين واشنطن التي تريد تمديدا آليا لمهمتها وموسكو الساعية لتحسين آلية عملها وتحديثها، ليصبح الاستناد إلى نتائجها ممكنا. إقرأ المزيد حلب خان شيخونموسكو: هواة أعدوا التقرير الدولي حول الكيميائي في سوريا واستنتجت اللجنة ودون الاستناد إلى أدلة الخبراء والوقائع على الأرض، "أن الجيش السوري مسؤول في خان شيخون عن استخدام السارين، و تنظيم (داعش) هو المسؤول عن استخدام غاز الخردل "في أم حوش. وبعد نشر التقرير ودراسته الأولية، قال نائب وزير الخارجية الروسي سيرغي ريابكوف، إن الوثيقة تحتوي على "عيوب منهجية"، و"تناقضات غير منطقية، واستنتاجات متناقضة وغير متجانسة ". ووصفت البعثة الروسية الدائمة لدى الأمم المتحدة في وقت لاحق، التقرير الأخير لهذه اللجنة بأنه يشبه تقارير الهواة "ويستند أساسا إلى الافتراضات والاستخدام الانتقائي للوقائع. وفي بعض الحالات، اعتبر الخبراء في موسكو أن المنهجية المستخدمة في إعداده هي منهجية "هواة". روسيا تقدم تحليلها للتقرير حول الأسلحة الكيميائية في سوريا ورفضت سوريا رسميا نتائج التقرير. وفي 24 أكتوبر الماضي، طرحت الولايات المتحدة بالفعل مشروع قرار حول تمديد ولاية البعثة كما هي، الأمر الذي اضطر روسيا لمعارضته والمطالبة بعدم مناقشة هذه المسألة قبل توزيع تقرير اللجنة عن الحادثين في خان شيخون وأم حوش. وفى الأسبوع الماضي قدمت الولايات المتحدة وروسيا إلى مجلس الأمن الدولي مشروعي قرارين مختلفين حول تمديد مهمة لجنة التحقيق المشتركة. واقترح المشروع الأمريكي تمديد هذه المهمة كما هي ودون أي تعديل لمدة 24 شهرا، مع التشديد على أنه "لا يجوز لأي طرف من الأطراف في سوريا استخدام الأسلحة الكيميائية أو تطويرها أو إنتاجها أو الحصول عليها أو تخزينها بطريقة أخرى". وخلافا للمشروع الأمريكي، يطالب المشروع الروسي بضرورة تحديث ولاية عمل هذه اللجنة حتى مايو/أيار 2018. وتضمين مهمتها ضرورة إرسال مجموعة من المحققين إلى موقع الحادث الكيماوي في خان شيخون "لإجراء تحقيق شامل باستخدام كافة الأساليب الممكنة" وكذلك إلى قاعدة الشعيرات الجوية لجمع عينات من هناك "للتحقق من الادعاءات بأن السارين المستخدم في خان شيخون كان مخزنا في هذه القاعدة الجوية" التي قصفتها الولايات المتحدة بصواريخ كروز الربيع الماضي.

thread.title: Electricité: possibles mesures exceptionnelles de restriction pendant l'hiver
thread.title_full: Electricité: possibles mesures exceptionnelles de restriction pendant l'hiver

posts.author: Par AFP
posts.title: Electricité: possibles mesures exceptionnelles de restriction pendant l'hiver
posts.text:
- A + A 
Le gestionnaire du réseau électrique RTE a prévenu mardi qu'il pourrait être amené à prendre des mesures "exceptionnelles" allant jusqu'à des coupures programmées cet hiver pour assurer l'alimentation des foyers français. 
Des arrêts de centrales non prévus ou des conditions climatiques hors normes "pourraient fragiliser l'alimentation électrique des Français" pendant les mois les plus froids, indique RTE dans son bilan prévisionnel. 
La sécurité d'approvisionnement électrique du pays est particulièrement sensible l'hiver, du fait de la place importante de l'électricité dans le chauffage des Français. 
L'offre de production énergétique sera supérieure à celle de l'hiver dernier, lorsqu'un nombre important de centrales nucléaires d'EDF avait été fermé, souligne RTE. Toutefois, le gestionnaire du réseau a placé l'hiver qui arrive "sous surveillance", signifiant qu'il nécessitera une vigilance particulière. 
Les mesures exceptionnelles qui pourraient être prises sont l'interruption de l'alimentation de gros consommateurs industriels volontaires ou encore une baisse de 5% de la tension sur les réseaux électriques. 
En tout dernier recours, RTE pourrait décider de coupures de courant momentanées, localisées et tournantes. 
Auteur : Par AFP

posts.author: Borrazópolis Notícias - Junior Dias (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Ocorrências registradas no Vale do Ivaí
posts.text:
Confira na íntegra as ocorrências registradas em Apucarana, Cambira, São Pedro do Ivaí, Ivaiporã, São João do Ivaí, Arapuã, Jardim Alegre e Rio Branco do Ivaí. 


Apucarana 08h30min Solicitante Natureza Furto Qualificado Preso NH Endereço Rua Renê Camargo de Azambuja Relata o solicitante que ao chegar ao escritório, percebeu que a porta estava arrombada e, apos verificar o local sentiu falta de dois computadores completos, uma impressora HP e R$ 350,00 em dinheiro. Não havia filmagens no local, sendo confeccionado o Boletim de Ocorrência. 
Apucarana 01h00min Solicitante Equipe PM Natureza Drogas para Consumo Preso masculino 20 anos Apreendido Masculino menor 17 anos Apreendido Masculino menor 17 anos Apreendido Feminino menor 17 anos Apreendido Feminino menor 16 anos Endereço Rua Osório Ribas de Paula Pç Cemitério Equipe recebeu denuncia via Copom, de que no local acima citado haveria alguns adolescentes consumindo entorpecente. Chegando ao local, a equipe visualizou um indivíduo dispensando uma porção de maconha. Foram abordados também mais quatro pessoas, sendo que durante busca pessoal foi encontrado uma porção maconha no bolso direito da calça de um deles. Indagados sobre os fatos, eles admitiram estarem compartilhando a droga no local. Um deles informou ter pago a quantia de cinco reais de um desconhecido no centro. Já outro informou ter pagado a quantia de cinco reais de um desconhecido na praça . Diante dos fatos, foi dado voz de apreensão aos menores, e de prisão ao maior, sendo encaminhados até a 17 SDP , para as providencias cabíveis. 
Apucarana 15h50min Solicitante Equipe PM Natureza Drogas para Consumo Preso masculino 39 anos Preso masculino 22 anos Endereço Rua Deolindo Massambani Pq Bela Vista Durante patrulhamento a Equipe recebeu informações de que um elemento de camiseta azul e com uma mochila rosa, estaria traficando no local. A Equipe realizou a abordagem do mesmo e de mais um elemento que estava no local, sendo que foi localizada uma pedra de crack. Diante o fato foram encaminhados a Delegacia. Vale salientar que um deles possui passagens pelos crimes de Lesão Corporal, Violência Doméstica, Furto Qualificado, Receptação,Trafico de Drogas. 
Apucarana 15h40min Solicitante Equipe PM Natureza Abordagem de Suspeitos Apreendido Masculino menor 16 anos Apreendido Masculino menor 15 anos Endereço Rua Galdino Gluk Junior centro Segundo solicitação ao Copom, dois elementos saíram de um matagal e estavam transitando na via sentido Sanepar, um deles aparentava estar armado. Diante do fato a Equipe foi deslocada e realizou a abordagem dos suspeitos, conforme características repassadas, e com eles, na cintura de cada um, foi localizado dois simulacros de pistolas, sendo uma prata e outra preta. Diante ao fato ambos foram, encaminhados a Delegacia. 
Apucarana 19h36min Solicitante Natureza Furto Qualificado Endereço Rua Ítalo Ado Fontanini Relatou o solicitante que saiu e esqueceu o portão e a porta aberta sendo que ao retornar, percebeu que do interior da sua casa havia sido furtado03 celulares, sendo um J1 mini Samsung, um J3 Samsung e um Nókia, um DVD portátil masca BAK e R$ 1.000,00 em espécie. 
Apucarana 00h16min Solicitante Natureza Introdução ou abandono de animais em propriedade alheia Endereço Rua Periquito – Conjunto Michel Soni O solicitante fez contato com o COPOM informando que no endereço citado o mesmo havia localizado 03 (três) cavalos, sendo estes, dois da raça manga larga e um da raça árabe, sendo que tinha conhecimento que os animais eram produto de furto em data anterior. Diante da situação, no local, a equipe realizou a entrega dos animais para o legítimo proprietário. 
Cambira 21h20min Natureza Roubo/ Veículo recuperado Vítima Antonio da Silva Local Rua Sergipe - Centro Segundo a vitima, quando chegavam da igreja por volta das vinte horas e trinta minutos, marginais armados com revolveres, os renderam e acabaram adentrando na casa junto com a família, vindo a amarrar o morador e da residência subtraíram uma camionete D20 de cor vermelha, uma TV 42” marca Toshiba; um aparelho celular Samsung prime J7 e um aparelho celular marca Nokia, mais um montante aproximado de duzentos e cinqüenta reais em espécie. Que somente após cerca de quarenta minutos uma pessoa fez contato com um amigo policial lotado na cidade de Mandaguari o qual informou a Cia de Jandaia do Sul acerca do ocorrido. No local foi abandonado um veiculo WV Gol de cor branca, veiculo que havia sido furtado na cidade de Apucarana horas antes. Que foi avistado pelas vitimas, um elemento moreno gordo, alto e um elemento claro e magro, que ameaçaram retornar caso chamassem a policia. O veiculo VW Gol foi apreendido e encaminhado a 17º sdp para providencias cabíveis. 
São Pedro do Ivaí 14h55min Vitima masculino 45 anos Natureza Roubo tentado / disparo de arma de fogo em via publica Local Av. Dr. Cícero de Moraes Esta equipe foi acionada por populares que no endereço acima citado havia ocorrido um roubo, foi feito contato com o solicitante e o mesmo relatou ser proprietário de uma lotérica e estava indo ao Banco do Brasil com um malote de dinheiro fazer deposito, quando foi surpreendido por um individuo de cor branca, estatura mediana, trajando camiseta xadrez de cor clara que deu voz de assalto em posse de um revolver, e entrou em luta corporal com o individuo que fez um disparo de arma de fogo para o alto e acabou desferindo uma coronhada em sua cabeça vindo a cair ao chão causando lesões na mão direita, na cabeça e no cotovelo esquerdo e não conseguindo ter a posse do malote o autor empreendeu fuga em uma motocicleta sendo conduzida por um homem com uma camiseta de cor preta, tomando rumo ignorado. Diante dos fatos foi feito diligencias em busca dos suspeitos por toda a extensão de São Pedro do Ivaí e em estradas que dão acesso a outros municípios, porem não houve êxito. 
IVAIPORÃ Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 07h00min  Natureza Furto Simples Local R. Salin Hayel Bitar, Casa Grande Solicitante Mulher Relato: A equipe foi acionado via copom a comparecer ao endereço acima citado onde haveria acontecido um furto, no local a solicitante informou que saiu por volta 01h00min e retornou as 07h00min do dia de hoje (06/11/2017) notando que a janela estava aberta e ao adentrar sua residência sentiu falta de sua TV AOC de 32 polegadas de cor preta, e um tablet genesis de cor preta, sem mais, a mesma foi orientada ,foi feito patrulhamento nas mediações porem nada foi localizado coube a esta equipe confeccionar este BOU. 

Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 14h47min  Natureza Perturbação do trabalho ou sossego alheio Local R. Jacarezinho, centro Solicitante Homem Relato: A equipe foi solicitada via copom a comparecer ao endereço acima citado onde estaria acontecendo um desacordo comercial, no local o solicitante e proprietário da auto elétrica relatou que um cliente identificado deixou seu veiculo corsa placa AFM-0773 para conserto e quando foi buscar alegou que foi colocado areia dentro do motor, diante da circunstancia o senhor ele solicitou a viatura e o autor se evadiu do local, o solicitante foi orientado quanto aos procedimentos e o mesmo não teve interesse em representar a esta equipe o confeccionou o BOU. 

Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 21h10min  Natureza Cumprimento de mandado judicial Local R. Pitanga, Conj. Espírito Santo Solicitante Ação Policial Detido Homem Relato: A equipe em PTRM pelo endereço acima citado visualizou um cidadão em atitude suspeita, sendo dada voz de abordagem o qual possuía um mandado de prisão Nº 000347980-30 em seu desfavor, durante a revista nada de ilícito foi encontrado o mesmo foi encaminhado a 54ª DRP para providencias. 
FAXINAL Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 09h00min Natureza Perturbação do Sossego Alheio Local R. Candido Bastiane Solicitante Homem Preso Mulher Equipe de Serviço Sd Salustiano, Sd Alessandro Relato: Segundo o solicitante ele estava em sua residência realizando a construção de um muro, e que chegou um mulher indagando o mesmo sobre um serviço que havia realizado em sua residência, e que este serviço estaria com infiltração, sendo informada pela vítima que não poderia ir ao local naquele momento, diante do fato a autora veio alterar a voz falando alto e chamando a atenção de vizinhos e ainda o chamou de pedreiro de meia colher. Mesmo a pediu para a autora se retirar devido estar atrapalhando seu trabalho e seu sossego a Ela não se retirou. No local a equipe constatou o fato, sendo que a vítima decidiu representar contra a autora, sendo encaminhado para delegacia de policia civil para as providências cabíveis. 

Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 10h45min  Natureza Lesão Corporal VD Local R. Bento Morais Solicitante Homem Apreendido Adolescente 16 anos Relato: A equipe policial foi acionada pela central de comunicação, relatando que uma menor estaria alterada e danificando os móveis da residência e que havia agredido seu convivente. No local a equipe constatou que havia eletrodoméstico no quintal da residência quebrado, bem como no interior da residência, sendo que a menor citada estava muito alterada, falando alto e inquieta. Realizado contato com solicitante que relatou que ao se preparar para o trabalho a menor começou a lhe agredir com um cabo de vassoura vindo a cortar sua boca na parte interna, ao tentar conter a agressão à autora começou a danificar os eletrodomésticos. Todo momento a menor relatou que faz uso constante de entorpecentes e que por ser menor de idade não pode sofrer qualquer sanção. Repassado a equipe policial pelo copom que o conselho tutelar não compareceria no local. Diante do fato a menor foi encaminhada para delegacia de policia civil para os procedimentos cabíveis. 
SÃO JOÃO DO IVAÍ Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 08h10min Natureza Furto qualificado e dano qualificado Local Rua. Lauro Lopes Dias, creche da vovó Solicitante Mulher Relato: A equipe de serviço foi acionada via copom para que deslocasse ate o local acima citado onde a solicitante afirma que a janela da CMEI creche da vovó Barbara (super creche) foi quebrada e alguém teria furtado um televisor, a equipe no local fez contato com a solicitante onde passou a relatar que ao chegar na creche e entrar na sala de aula notou que o vidro estava quebrada e que um televisor da marca Philco 32 polegadas teria sido furtada, diante dos fatos a equipe realizou patrulhamento pelo local e em seguida confeccionou o BOU. 
ARAPUÃ Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 09h16min  Natureza Extravio ou Perda de Documentos. Local Rua presidente café filho. Solicitante Mulher Relato: Veio até este destacamento Policial Militar, a solicitante, junto com seu filho e seu irmão, repassou que reside em Americana-SP, Rua da Sinceridade, n° 77, Bairro Jardim da Paz. Ela afirma que perdeu sua identidade quando estava viajando de Ameiricana-SP para Londrina-PR pela Viação Garcia no dia 04/11/2017. Por volta das 05h da manhã do dia 05/11/2017 no momento de comprar outra passagem na rodoviária em Londrina-PR percebeu que havia perdido seu documento. Deseja Registrar o Boletim de Ocorrência para fazer uma segunda via no órgão competente. 
JARDIM ALEGRE Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 10h50min  Natureza Atendimento de local de morte Local Rua Timbira, Conj. Frontini Lima Solicitante Copom 6ª CIPM Relato: Esta equipe foi solicitada via copom a comparecer no endereço supracitado onde um homem teria cometido suicídio. No local a equipe adentrou a residência e em um cômodo nos fundos estava J. M. B., pendurado pelo pescoço com uma corda amarrada em um caibro de sustentação do telhado do cômodo e sem sinais vitais, foi entrado em contato com o irmão da vitima, que informou que minutos antes do ocorrido à vítima estava conversando normalmente e sem atitudes suspeitas. Foi conversado também com o pedreiro que trabalhava na residência, e o mesmo informou que a vítima estava ajudando na reforma da casa quando de repente não o viu mais, momentos depois a mãe da vítima, foi até o cômodo dos fundos para pegar uma ferramenta momento em que se deparou com a vitima presa pelo pescoço então pediu socorro, mas a vitima já não tinha mais sinais vitais. Diante dos fatos a equipe solicitou a presença do IML e da policia civil, que recolheram o corpo para os procedimentos de praxe. 

Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 11h30min  Natureza Cumprimento de mandado de prisão Local Avenida Tancredo Neves s/n Trevo secundario Solicitante Ação Policial Preso Homem Relato: Em patrulhamento pelo local acima citado, a equipe realizou a abordagem de um cidadão em atitude suspeita e ao consultar seu nome via copom 6ª CIPM foi constatado que havia em seu desfavor um mandado de prisão expedido pela comarca de Ivaiporã. A equipe então lhe deu voz de prisão, o cientificou de seus direitos e o conduziu para a 54ª DRP de Ivaiporã para os demais procedimentos. 
RIO BRANCO DO IVAI Data 06/11/2017 Horário: 17h30min  Natureza Fato Futuro Local Assentamento Egidio Brunet – DPM RBI Solicitante Mulher Relato: Compareceu a este destacamento a solicitante relatando que na sexta feira (06/10/2017) que uma professora esteve na sua residência e levou a sua filha para a igreja, porém a mãe teve conhecimento que a sua filha ficou no assentamento na casa de um homem e apareceu na terça feira (10/10/2017) em sua residência cheia de hematomas no corpo próximo aos seios, relata que a filha ficou depressiva após isso vindo a ficar somente no quarto e entristecida, e passado isso na segunda feira (17/10/2017) a filha surtou, fato que consta no boletim 1210926/2017, a filha relatou e confirmou o que disse sua mãe, conforme consta em boletim. Durante o relato ela mostrou fotos sensuais que disse terem sido tiradas no dia da festa, chorou ficou alterada, sendo necessário atendimento medico, solicitamos a presença da equipe de saúde que veio e a levou para o hospital. Informou-nos a mãe que ela tem tido surtos seguidamente.

thread.title_full: <전생에 웬수들> 최윤영X구원, 첫 만남부터 물벼락? 첫 촬영 현장 포착! : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: iMBC
posts.title: <전생에 웬수들> 최윤영X구원, 첫 만남부터 물벼락? 첫 촬영 현장 포착!
posts.text:
MBC 새 일일연속극 <전생에 웬수들>(극본 김지은, 연출 김흥동)이 11월 27일 첫 방송을 앞두고 첫 촬영 현장을 공개해 화제다.
 공개된 스틸 컷에는 첫 만남부터 흠뻑 물벼락을 맞은 최윤영과 구원이 마주한 모습이 생생히 담겨 눈길을 끈다.
또한 지나가던 어르신의 짐을 선뜻 옮겨드리는 최윤영과 먼발치에서 놀란 눈으로 윤영을 뚫어져라 바라는 구원의 모습은 작품과 캐릭터에 대한 궁금증을 자아낸다.
최윤영과 구원은 각각 강한 생활력과 책임감을 가진 열혈 취준생 최고야와 수려한 외모에 능력 있는 이혼 전문 변호사 민지석 역으로 캐스팅되어 연기 호흡을 맞춘다.
첫 촬영을 마친 최윤영은 “항상 유쾌한 분위기를 만들어주시는 감독님과 제작진이 다들 도와주시는 덕분에 최고야에 푹 빠져 살고 있다. <전생에 웬수들> 많은 기대 부탁드린다”라고 소감을 전했다. 이어 구원은 “군 제대 후 복귀작이어서 설렘과 긴장감을 동시에 느끼며 촬영에 임하고 있다. 앞으로도 최선을 다하겠다”고 포부를 밝혔다.
<전생에 웬수들>은 120부작 일일연속극으로, 두 가족이 안고 있는 비밀과 악연의 고리를 풀고 진짜 가족으로 거듭나는 이야기를 그린 드라마. <좋은 사람>, <위대한 조강지처>, <모두 다 김치>, <사랑했나봐> 등에서 인상적인 연출을 보여준 김흥동PD가 연출을, <청담동 스캔들>, <순결한 당신>, <결혼 합시다>의 김지은 작가가 극본을 맡았다.
‘웬수’들과 함께 진정한 ‘천생연분’의 의미를 그릴 것을 예고해 기대를 모으고 있는 <전생에 웬수들>은 <돌아온 복단지>의 후속으로, 오는 11월 27일(월) 첫 방송될 예정이다.
iMBC 백아영 | 사진제공 MBC
※ 이 콘텐츠는 저작권법에 의하여 보호를 받는바, 무단 전재 복제, 배포등을 금합니다

thread.title: What needs to be done to get our kids money smart | The Daily Advertiser
thread.title_full: What needs to be done to get our kids money smart | The Daily Advertiser

posts.author: Nicole Pedersen-Mckinnon
posts.title: What needs to be done to get our kids money smart | The Daily Advertiser
posts.text:
Fairfax columnist and personal finance expert Nicole Pedersen-McKinnon responds to ASIC's call for comments on the National Financial Literacy Strategy. 
Dear Australian Securities and Investments Commission, 
Please consider this my 2??-worth on your call for comments on the National Financial Literacy Strategy, which began when the wonderful Paul Clitheroe was appointed head of a taskforce in 2004. 
Financial literacy can really be thought of as money smarts and it's make-or-break stuff, as the graphic shows. Two out of five Aussies say money mistakes they made in their 20s haunted them into their 30s and even 40s, according to a Get Credit Score survey. 
Forget my writings or my TV commentary; it's my presenting work in high schools that gets the biggest reaction. "Oh, I wish I'd had that," virtually every adult I speak to says. Then: "My son/daughter has no idea about money." 
And I can attest jaws hit the ground when I tell students they're more at risk of ruining their credit rating than their parents, thanks to comprehensive credit reporting ??? if they put a gap year on a credit card and pay just the minimum, it could take them 44 years to clear ??? that they might pay $100,000 for a university degree (but HECS-HELP is the only form of debt I support). 
How their eyes light up, though, when I point out that as overwhelmed and under-prepared as many feel, they've an asset their parents don't have: time. The magic of compounding means investing just $6 a day from age 15 at an 8 per cent return will make anyone a millionaire at 60 ??? with $900,000 "free". 
But once we leave those school gates, it's a steep learning curve indeed (witness how almost 30,000 adult Fairfax Media readers fared on the basic money smarts pre-test I give school kids). And the rise of fintech and financial innovation increasingly targeted at young people, ups the ante on the threats as well as the opportunities. 
It is genuinely harder for this generation to learn about money than it was for us. Fairly soon the physical thing won't exist ??? and they've been using their student IDs like a spend-and-forget credit card at the tuckshop for years. 
So it's completely valid that Laura Higgins, ASIC's new senior executive leader for financial capability and a former teacher, cites helping get money instruction throughout the national curriculum from 2015 as her proudest achievement. 
"It was a huge effort to make that happen but what that means now is that financial literacy is not an extra in schools, it's embedded," Higgins told me. 
Elements of money and its management now occur not in just maths, as you might expect, but into science and English. 
"It is there [in different subjects] but that doesn't mean when parents ask their child about school, they'll say 'we learnt financial literacy'," she says. 
Equipping our graduates with real-world financial survival skills is personal for Higgins. "My family didn't make it from pay cheque to pay cheque. My Dad got paid on a Thursday and we would run out of milk on a Monday," she confides. 
"So I'm big on the importance of empowering people with information and building confidence to make decisions." Recommendation No. 1: Promote the progress! 
The trouble is, for all the amazing work of Higgins, Clitheroe and many others, too few teachers know about the tremendous resources on moneysmart.gov.au - ready-to-go lesson plans mapped to the curriculum . 
These need more promotion "on the ground" (and there's only one of me!) 
Invariably when I talk directly to educators or post anything on social media about the teaching resources, one teacher will also give me a serve like: "I don't have enough time to teach my subject as it is - surely this is the parents' responsibility!" 
And it's a fair point. So my next suggestion is ??? Recommendation No. 2: Resources for role models 
Parents need independent, engaging multimedia resources to help them give their children a solid financial foundation. Let's face it, just because you're a mum or dad doesn't mean you're not also among the 36 per cent of Australians who find dealing with money stressful and overwhelming (from ASIC's Australian Financial Attitudes and Behaviour Tracker). 
Higgins tells a poignant story about how her family's mail, because it was usually bills, would go on top of the fridge. "I can't have things on my fridge. That's the anxiety spot," she explains of the legacy of a challenged money start. 
But that's not to say parents need lots of money to model good money management. "Often people with very little money can do a lot with little money," she says. 
Sure, adults can use the great information on MoneySmart.gov.au to give themselves more financial confidence, but there's nothing on there to help them communicate life-changing money lessons to their kids. Recommendation No. 3: A code of conduct with kids 
This brings me to an awkward one. It is wonderful that official financial literacy efforts embrace and encourage every individual and organisation that wants to help. 
I believe it takes a village to raise a money-smart child. However, where our susceptible, brand-impressionable children are involved, that village needs a code of ethics. 
This one's personal to me and it's why I now do what I do in high schools. 
My son rushed home from year 1 one day, all excited about the nice man from the bank who'd come to talk to him about "Mummy money stuff". 
"Which bank, darling?" I (needn't have) asked. 
"I don't know. Oh - but they have this awesome logo that's black and this super special type of yellow that no other company in the world is allowed to have." 
That's not independent financial education - it's brand brainwashing. It also speaks to the reason so much funding is allocated to this "education" initiative: the latest reading of my Interest Integrity Index shows lifetime loyalty to any Big 4 bank will cost a student an excess $123,000 in interest. 
The words "shop around" remain the secret (literally in these schools) to financial success. Recommendation No. 4: Fund our future 
I commend the government for continuing the (it should be noted traditionally bipartisan) budgetary support for financial capability. Because for us, our children and our economy, this is too important to ignore. And for all the wonderful progress made, more needs to be done. 
In particular, Higgins has some great ideas about how to help 18 to 22-year-olds and single parents. 
Hopefully, ASIC, my thoughts spur other interested individuals and entities to also make a submission to the National Financial Literacy Strategy consultation - they have until November 17. 
Nicole Pedersen-McKinnon is a commentator and educator who presents her Smart Money Start , fun financial literacy incursion, in high schools around Australia: Follow Nicole on Facebook

posts.title: 毒蟲自作聰明皮帶加工藏毒 遇警心慌猛抓腰間露餡被逮 | 社會 | 三立新聞網 SETN.COM
posts.text:
魔高一尺道高一丈！新北市一名52歲陳姓男子，昨晚11時許徒步行經樹林國凱街時遇上巡邏員警盤查，一時心慌言語間面露慌張，更不時抓著腰間的皮帶，詭異的動作被眼尖員警發現，隨即要他脫下皮帶受檢，果然發現他將安非他命分裝藏在自行加工的皮帶夾層中，當場人贓俱獲，也讓陳男不禁拜服嘆道：這樣都能被你們發現！ ▲警方發現陳男將毒品夾在皮帶夾層內。（圖／翻攝畫面） 
警方表示，染上毒癮惡習20餘年的陳姓男子，平時在桃園市工地打零工，自認為躲避警方盤查經驗豐富，異想天開竟將腰間的皮帶自行加工成拉鍊式開關，並將毒品藏在皮帶內，自以為不會被人發現。 ▲陳男自作聰明將毒品藏在皮帶夾層中。（圖／翻攝畫面） 
不料，昨晚11時許，樹林警分局彭厝派出所員警巡邏途中，行經國凱街時，發現陳男獨自一人形跡可疑地走在路上，隨即上前盤查，卻發現他神色面露慌張，雙手不時往腰間的皮帶猛抓，讓員警直覺可疑，隨即要他脫下皮帶受檢，當場在夾層中發現4包重約11.65克的安非他命毒品，陳男坦承持有和吸食毒品，卻對毒品來源說詞含糊，不願透露毒品從何得來，警方訊後將他依毒品罪嫌移送法辦，此外也將持續追查毒品上游來源。

posts.author: cdontas
posts.title: Ηράκλειο: 2 άτομα συνελήφθησαν για κατοχή και διακίνηση ναρκωτικών
posts.text:
- A + A 
Στη σύλληψη δύο ατόμων για κατοχή και διακίνηση ναρκωτικών προχώρησαν οι αστυνομικές αρχές στο Ηράκλειο. 
Πρόκειται για ένα 56χρονο Έλληνα και ένα 34χρονο Αλβανό που, όπως ανακοίνωσε η ΕΛΑΣ, φέρονται ότι κατείχαν και διακινούσαν μεγάλες ποσότητες ναρκωτικών. 
Αστυνομικοί ύστερα από έρευνες στα σπίτια των δυο συλληφθέντων βρήκαν και κατάσχεσαν, μεταξύ άλλων: Ποσότητα ηρωίνης σε μορφή βράχου και σε σκόνη συνολικού μεικτού βάρους 3,032 γραμμαρίων, 84 γραμμάρια κοκαΐνης, 450 ναρκωτικά δισκία χωρίς ιατρική συνταγή, καθώς και σύνεργα κονιορτοποίησης και ανάμειξης ηρωίνης και κοκαΐνης. 
Οι συλληφθέντες με την σε βάρος τους σχηματισθείσα δικογραφία θα οδηγηθούν στον εισαγγελέα Πλημμελειοδικών Ηρακλείου. 
ΠΗΓΗ: ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ

thread.title: 迷妹上身！陳喬恩搞笑變小小春「滿嘴火龍果」 網友急催生 | 娛樂 | 三立新聞網 SETN.COM
thread.title_full: 迷妹上身！陳喬恩搞笑變小小春「滿嘴火龍果」 網友急催生 | 娛樂 | 三立新聞網 SETN.COM

posts.title: 迷妹上身！陳喬恩搞笑變小小春「滿嘴火龍果」 網友急催生 | 娛樂 | 三立新聞網 SETN.COM
posts.text:
三立新聞網 
娛樂中心／綜合報導 
大陸親子實境節目《爸爸去哪兒5》吹起一股「萌娃」熱潮，不只圈到網友，就連大牌明星也一個個落入這些星二代的魅力中，繼歌手林宥嘉和五月天阿信後，陳喬恩也中了陳小春兒子Jasper的毒，她日前在微博貼出一段影片，用特效相機模仿《爸爸去哪兒5》裡3位小童星，並特別提到Jasper，許多網友笑她又沈迷《爸爸去哪兒》，成為粉絲認證的「爸爸死忠粉」！ ▲陳喬恩大玩Neinei、嗯哼還有Jasper的主題濾鏡。（圖／翻攝自秒拍） 
女星陳喬恩日前貼出一段模仿小童星的影片，短短10秒創下442萬次點閱數，影片中的她分割成三個小畫面，分別是Neinei小天使、2條小辮子亂飄的嗯哼，以及火龍果香腸嘴Jasper，她盯著鏡頭嘟嘴賣萌，用每個小童星的特效和大家打招呼，但她在錄影前可能還沒找到Jasper的主題濾鏡，還疑惑問：「為什麼沒有Jasper？」粉絲除了稱讚陳喬恩的呆萌外，也紛紛向她「催生」，希望喜歡小孩的她也趕緊生個小孩來玩玩。 ▲陳喬恩目前還是黃金單身女，網友祝福她快結婚生子。（圖／翻攝自微博） 
其實陳喬恩算是「元祖級」的爸爸粉，她從第一季開始就是死忠觀眾，曾經在參加活動時遇到小童星秒變迷妹，主動上前要求握手和抱抱，而林宥嘉也興奮表示想和Jasper交朋友交換e-mail，就連阿信也在微博裡貼出Jasper的金句，引來網友高度關注。 ▲Jasper自參加節目後人氣大增。（圖／翻攝自臉書）

'?' : '&'; // Are we using query strings? if ($this->page_query_string === TRUE) { // If a custom first_url hasn't been specified, we'll create one from // the base_url, but without the page item. if ($first_url === '') { $first_url = $base_url; // If we saved any GET items earlier, make sure they're appended. if ( ! empty($get)) { $first_url .= $query_string_sep.http_build_query($get); } } // Add the page segment to the end of the query string, where the // page number will be appended. $base_url .= $query_string_sep.http_build_query(array_merge($get, array($this->query_string_segment => ''))); } else { // Standard segment mode. // Generate our saved query string to append later after the page number. if ( ! empty($get)) { $query_string = $query_string_sep.http_build_query($get); $this->suffix .= $query_string; } // Does the base_url have the query string in it? // If we're supposed to save it, remove it so we can append it later. if ($this->reuse_query_string === TRUE && ($base_query_pos = strpos($base_url, '?')) !== FALSE) { $base_url = substr($base_url, 0, $base_query_pos); } if ($first_url === '') { $first_url = $base_url.$query_string; } $base_url = rtrim($base_url, '/').'/'; } // Determine the current page number. $base_page = ($this->use_page_numbers) ? 1 : 0; // Are we using query strings? if ($this->page_query_string === TRUE) { $this->cur_page = $this->CI->input->get($this->query_string_segment); } elseif (empty($this->cur_page)) { // Default to the last segment number if one hasn't been defined. if ($this->uri_segment === 0) { $this->uri_segment = count($this->CI->uri->segment_array()); } $this->cur_page = $this->CI->uri->segment($this->uri_segment); // Remove any specified prefix/suffix from the segment. if ($this->prefix !== '' OR $this->suffix !== '') { $this->cur_page = str_replace(array($this->prefix, $this->suffix), '', $this->cur_page); } } else { $this->cur_page = (string) $this->cur_page; } // If something isn't quite right, back to the default base page. if ( ! ctype_digit($this->cur_page) OR ($this->use_page_numbers && (int) $this->cur_page === 0)) { $this->cur_page = $base_page; } else { // Make sure we're using integers for comparisons later. $this->cur_page = (int) $this->cur_page; } // Is the page number beyond the result range? // If so, we show the last page. if ($this->use_page_numbers) { if ($this->cur_page > $num_pages) { $this->cur_page = $num_pages; } } elseif ($this->cur_page > $this->total_rows) { $this->cur_page = ($num_pages - 1) * $this->per_page; } $uri_page_number = $this->cur_page; // If we're using offset instead of page numbers, convert it // to a page number, so we can generate the surrounding number links. if ( ! $this->use_page_numbers) { $this->cur_page = (int) floor(($this->cur_page/$this->per_page) + 1); } // Calculate the start and end numbers. These determine // which number to start and end the digit links with. $start = (($this->cur_page - $this->num_links) > 0) ? $this->cur_page - ($this->num_links - 1) : 1; $end = (($this->cur_page + $this->num_links) < $num_pages) ? $this->cur_page + $this->num_links : $num_pages; // And here we go... $output = ''; // Render the "First" link. if ($this->first_link !== FALSE && $this->cur_page > ($this->num_links + 1 + ! $this->num_links)) { // Take the general parameters, and squeeze this pagination-page attr in for JS frameworks. $attributes = sprintf('%s %s="%d"', $this->_attributes, $this->data_page_attr, 1); $output .= $this->first_tag_open.'_attr_rel('start').'>' .$this->first_link.''.$this->first_tag_close; } // Render the "Previous" link. if ($this->prev_link !== FALSE && $this->cur_page !== 1) { $i = ($this->use_page_numbers) ? $uri_page_number - 1 : $uri_page_number - $this->per_page; $attributes = sprintf('%s %s="%d"', $this->_attributes, $this->data_page_attr, ($this->cur_page - 1)); if ($i === $base_page) { // First page $output .= $this->prev_tag_open.'_attr_rel('prev').'>' .$this->prev_link.''.$this->prev_tag_close; } else { $append = $this->prefix.$i.$this->suffix; $output .= $this->prev_tag_open.'_attr_rel('prev').'>' .$this->prev_link.''.$this->prev_tag_close; } } // Render the pages if ($this->display_pages !== FALSE) { // Write the digit links for ($loop = $start - 1; $loop <= $end; $loop++) { $i = ($this->use_page_numbers) ? $loop : ($loop * $this->per_page) - $this->per_page; $attributes = sprintf('%s %s="%d"', $this->_attributes, $this->data_page_attr, $loop); if ($i >= $base_page) { if ($this->cur_page === $loop) { // Current page $output .= $this->cur_tag_open.$loop.$this->cur_tag_close; } elseif ($i === $base_page) { // First page $output .= $this->num_tag_open.'_attr_rel('start').'>' .$loop.''.$this->num_tag_close; } else { $append = $this->prefix.$i.$this->suffix; $output .= $this->num_tag_open.'' .$loop.''.$this->num_tag_close; } } } } // Render the "next" link if ($this->next_link !== FALSE && $this->cur_page < $num_pages) { $i = ($this->use_page_numbers) ? $this->cur_page + 1 : $this->cur_page * $this->per_page; $attributes = sprintf('%s %s="%d"', $this->_attributes, $this->data_page_attr, $this->cur_page + 1); $output .= $this->next_tag_open.'_attr_rel('next').'>'.$this->next_link.''.$this->next_tag_close; } // Render the "Last" link if ($this->last_link !== FALSE && ($this->cur_page + $this->num_links + ! $this->num_links) < $num_pages) { $i = ($this->use_page_numbers) ? $num_pages : ($num_pages * $this->per_page) - $this->per_page; $attributes = sprintf('%s %s="%d"', $this->_attributes, $this->data_page_attr, $num_pages); $output .= $this->last_tag_open.'' .$this->last_link.''.$this->last_tag_close; } // Kill double slashes. Note: Sometimes we can end up with a double slash // in the penultimate link so we'll kill all double slashes. $output = preg_replace('#([^:"])//+#', '\\1/', $output); // Add the wrapper HTML if exists return $this->full_tag_open.$output.$this->full_tag_close; } // -------------------------------------------------------------------- /** * Parse attributes * * @param array $attributes * @return void */ protected function _parse_attributes($attributes) { isset($attributes['rel']) OR $attributes['rel'] = TRUE; $this->_link_types = ($attributes['rel']) ? array('start' => 'start', 'prev' => 'prev', 'next' => 'next') : array(); unset($attributes['rel']); $this->_attributes = ''; foreach ($attributes as $key => $value) { $this->_attributes .= ' '.$key.'="'.$value.'"'; } } // -------------------------------------------------------------------- /** * Add "rel" attribute * * @link http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/links.html#linkTypes * @param string $type * @return string */ protected function _attr_rel($type) { if (isset($this->_link_types[$type])) { unset($this->_link_types[$type]); return ' rel="'.$type.'"'; } return ''; } }

thread.title: Feuer auf dem Asiamarkt – Mit Video
thread.title_full: Feuer auf dem Asiamarkt – Mit Video

posts.author: Daniel Kroha
posts.title: Feuer auf dem Asiamarkt – Mit Video
posts.text:
Ein Feuer hat Montagabend auf dem Asiamarkt “Dragon Bazar” direkt hinter dem Grenzübergang bei Waldsassen gewütet. 
Laut dem tschechischen Nachrichtenportal blesk.cz geht die Polizei von einem Schaden von rund 2,5 Millionen Kronen (ca. 100.000 Euro) aus.
Das Feuer brach gegen 21 Uhr aus. Die Brandursache ist derzeit noch nicht bekannt. Zahlreiche Stände wurden Opfer der Flammen.

thread.title: Pourquoi il y aura une "No Finish Line" à Nice en juin 2018
thread.title_full: Pourquoi il y aura une "No Finish Line" à Nice en juin 2018

posts.author: C.V. et A.C.
posts.title: Pourquoi il y aura une "No Finish Line" à Nice en juin 2018
posts.text:
PAR C.V. et A.C. Mis à jour le 07/11/2017 à 08:35   08:34 Mis à jour le 07/11/2017 à 08:35   08:34 
La No Finish Line est devenue un grand rendez-vous populaire, sportif et caritatif à Monaco. Photo Cyril Dodergny Pourquoi il y aura une "No Finish Line" à Nice en juin 2018 Par C.V. et A.C. Le 07/11 à 08h34 MàJ 07/11 à 08h35 Chaque mois de novembre depuis 1999 à Monaco, se dispute la très attendue No Finish Line, une épreuve à la fois sportive, populaire et caritative. En juin 2018, ce concept, qui cartonne en Principauté, sera organisé également sur la Promenade des Anglais. 
La "No Finish Line" a été inventée à Monaco en 1999 par Philippe Verdier, un grand passionné de course à pied. L'idée était toute simple: ouvrir un parcours pendant plusieurs jours, 24h sur 24, et transformer chaque kilomètre parcouru, en courant ou en marchant, en euro. 
La prochaine NFL se déroulera à Monaco du 11 au 19 novembre, sur un tracé de 1.400 mètres autour du chapiteau de Fontvieille. L'an dernier, 13.297 coureurs et marcheurs ont parcouru 392.516 kilomètres et, grâce à de nombreux partenaires, permis de collecter autant d'euros qui ont ensuite été distribués à plusieurs associations et structures oeuvrant au profit des enfants défavorisés, à Monaco, sur la Côte d'Azur et à travers le monde. 
Une grande partie des fonds récoltés permet ainsi, chaque année, d’opérer du cœur une douzaine d’enfants au centre cardio-thoracique de Monaco. L'an dernier, l'association Chilldren & Future, qui dirige la No Finish Line, a également permis à la Fondation Lenval, à Nice, d’acquérir un gastroscope adapté aux nourrissons (31.359 euros). 
Depuis plusieurs années, l’association NFL International a commencé à développer le concept né en Principauté pour l’exporter dans plusieurs villes, principalement en Europe, pour l’heure. En 2018, ce sera, par exemple, la deuxième édition d’une No Finish Line à Athènes en Grèce, à Oslo en Norvège. Ce sera également la quatrième à Paris. 
Et la toute première à Nice. Philippe Verdier a convaincu la mairie de Nice avec le concept d’une boucle d’un kilomètre le long du quai des Etats-Unis, au bout de la Promenade des Anglais. Une boucle que les coureurs pourront fouler jour et nuit du 6 au 10 juin 2018. Les dates sont désormais officielles. 
"À chaque édition dans une autre ville, nous allons sur place pour apporter notre expertise et nous conseillons à chaque fois que les euros récoltés pour les kilomètres courus aillent soutenir des actions en faveur de l’enfance", explique-t-il. 
Son objectif, rêvé à moyen terme, serait d’arriver à fédérer 52 villes dans le monde pour que chaque semaine, quelque part sur la planète, se coure une No Finish Line. 
Bien entendu, la No Finish Line de Monaco, en 2018 comme les années suivantes, restera en Principauté, calée juste avant la Fête nationale.

thread.title: This Is Us Star Alexandra Breckenridge Reveals Why She Almost Kept Her Pregnancy Secret
thread.title_full: This Is Us Star Alexandra Breckenridge Reveals Why She Almost Kept Her Pregnancy Secret

posts.author: Lilian Min
posts.title: This Is Us Star Alexandra Breckenridge Reveals Why She Almost Kept Her Pregnancy Secret
posts.text:
Alexandra Breckenridge has a sweet gig on NBC's smash hit This Is Us : She gets to play the other half to Justin Hartley's Kevin Pearson and be a part of the weepiest show on TV. But she admitted in an interview with Us Weekly that she thought she'd put her job in jeopardy after she got pregnant.
"I was like, 'I’m gonna get fired.' I was scared to tell [producers] because I thought it would cause issues for production," Breckenridge, who also starred on the Walking Dead , revealed. While acting history has been filled with cases of stars hiding their baby bumps on screen, and pregnancy discrimination is decidedly illegal, that hasn't prevented people alleging time and time again that their family planning decisions have led to demotions or gotten them passed over for promotions, or outright fired.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Luckily (and, like, legally), Breckenridge didn't run into any issues breaking the news to show creator Dan Fogelman: "I called Dan and said, 'I’m sorry. I’m pregnant.' He was just like, 'Oh, that’s amazing! Congratulations!' He’s so nice."
This will be Breckenridge's second child with guitarist Casey Hooper, and she changed up her normal pregnancy routines to play better with the show's production by easing up on her ice cream cravings: "This time around I’m working and I wanted to make production’s job easier at hiding my pregnancy!"
Speaking of the show though, Breckenridge did drop this tidbit about her character Sophie's relationship with Kevin: "Kevin and Sophie, they’ve loved each other since they were kids. They’ve been off and on since they were children. I think that eventually it’s gonna work out for them, or at least I hope it does. I think they have a bond that’s kind of unbreakable."

thread.title_full: UN사-연합사-주한미군사령부 작전참모, 오산 미육군 제 35 방공포병여단 방문 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 옥인만호
posts.title: UN사-연합사-주한미군사령부 작전참모, 오산 미육군 제 35 방공포병여단 방문
posts.text:
http://citrain64.blog.me/221134071076
유엔사·연합사·주한미군사령부 작전참모, 오산 미육군 제35방공포병여단 방문 유엔사·연합사·주한미군사령부 작전참모, 오산 미육군 제35방공포병여단 방문 유엔사·한미연합사·주한미군... citrain64.blog.me
지난 1일 미 제 35 방공포병여단 공식 페이스북에 의하면 UN사. 한미연삽사 주한미군사령부 작전참모 마이클 A 빌즈 소장이 오산에 주둔한 미 육군 제 35 방공포병여단 예하 제 52 방공포병연대 6대대 D포대를 방문 했다고 밝혔습니다.
마이클 A 빌즈 소장은 현재 미 제 8 군 사령관 젠 토마스 S. 반달 후임으로 미 8군 사령관에 내정 되어 있다고 하네요.
빌즈 소장은 제 35 방공포병여단을 방문한 목적은 구체적으로 밝히지 않았지만 제 35 방공포병여단 페이스북에서는 미 8군은 한반도 휴전 상태 유지하는 작전 3단계인 훈련, 동맹강화, 병화를 통해 준비태세를 창출하고 있다 고 밝혔습니다.

posts.author: Kalvis
posts.text:
Re: Karavani elekter (220 ja 12) Tsiteeri Kalvis » 07 Nov 2017, 08:27
Karavani elektrisüsteemile on mõned lisanõuded, kuid muus osas ei erine see mitte üks raas. Ehitada saad seda tavalistest elektriseadmetest (kaitsed, latid, kilbid jne.), koostamise põhimõtted samad.
RVK ei ole ainult inimese kaitseks, teda võib kasutada elektriseadmetes (mootoriahelates) samamoodi. Ja karavanis samuti.

thread.title: Το φραουλόσπιτο, η κονσόλα της Nintedo -Πόσο αξίζουν σήμερα τα παιχνίδια της δεκαετίας του '80 [εικόνες]
thread.title_full: Το φραουλόσπιτο, η κονσόλα της Nintedo -Πόσο αξίζουν σήμερα τα παιχνίδια της δεκαετίας του '80 [εικόνες]

posts.author: schristou
posts.title: Το φραουλόσπιτο, η κονσόλα της Nintedo -Πόσο αξίζουν σήμερα τα παιχνίδια της δεκαετίας του '80 [εικόνες]
posts.text:
ΝΕΟΣ ΘΗΣΑΥΡΟΣ ΓΙΑ ΤΟΥΣ «ΣΥΛΛΕΚΤΕΣ» Το φραουλόσπιτο, η κονσόλα της Nintedo -Πόσο αξίζουν σήμερα τα παιχνίδια της δεκαετίας του '80 [εικόνες] - A + A 
Αν είσαι από τα άτομα που δεν πετούν τίποτα, ακόμη και τα παιχνίδια με τα οποία έπαιζαν όταν ήταν μικροί, τότε σίγουρα θα ενθουσιαστείς όταν μάθεις πως πλέον κοστίζουν πολλά περισσότερα από την αρχική τους τιμή. 
Όσοι, λοιπόν, είχαν αποκτήσει στα ‘80s μερικά από τα πιο γνωστά παιχνίδια που έκαναν θραύση τότε, τώρα μπορούν να πουλήσουν στο διαδίκτυο εισπράττοντας από 200 δολάρια μέχρι και 1.000. 
Ποια είναι όμως τα παιχνίδια που αγαπούν οι συλλέκτες και δίνουν ένα αρκετά μεγάλο ποσό για να τα αποκτήσουν; 
\ 
Οι φιγούρες She-Ra και Swift Wind Action Figurines κυκλοφόρησαν το 1985 και τότε κόστιζαν 15 δολάρια. Σήμερα μπορεί κάποιος να το πουλήσει μέχρι και 200 δολ. 
Το φραουλόσπιτο έγινε από τα πιο περιζήτητα κουκλόσπιτα το ‘80s με χιλιάδες γονείς να δίνουν 30 δολάρια για να αποκτήσουν το σπιτάκι με τα 6 δωμάτια. Σήμερα, από την πώληση αυτού μπορεί κάποιος να βγει κερδισμένος κατά 150 δολάρια. 
Αυτό το ανδρικό όχημα με βάση για ελικόπτερο και όνομα Joe General εξαφανίστηκε από τις αγορές περίπου το 1992. Σήμερα η τιμή που μπορεί να πιάσει είναι ακόμη και 600 δολάρια. 
Δεν υπάρχει συλλέκτης παιχνιδιών που να μην θέλει να αποκτήσει το πρώτο Nintendo, το οποίο κυκλοφόρησε το 1985. Η πρώτη συσκευή- κονσόλα είχε γίνει ανάρπαστη τότε, ενώ τώρα στα μάτια των περισσότερων δεν θυμίζει τίποτα με τις συσκευές του σήμερα. Έτσι αν καποιος το έχει ακόμη στην κατοχή του μπορεί να κερδίσει ακόμη και 1.000 δολάρια. 
Η πρώτη φιγούρα του Thunder Wings Lion- O μπορεί τότε να κόστιζε μόνο 30 δολάρια, αλλά μετά την επιτυχία που γνώρισε το κινούμενο σχέδιο, σήμερα μπορεί κάποιος να πουλήσει αυτή την φιγούρα έναντι 350 δολαρίων. 
Ο αρκουδος Ραξπιν ήταν ο πρώτος που μπορούσε να βγάλει ήχους. Βάζοντας μία κασέτα στην πλάτη του, το παιχνίδι είχε γίνει τόσο ανάρπαστο τότε που κόστιζε 100 δολάρια. Σήμερα η τιμή του είναι γύρω στα 600. 
Αυτές οι 4 φιγούρες των Real Ghostbusters ήταν τόσο δημοφιλείς τότε που σήμερα μπορεί να τις πουλήσει κάποιος και τις 4 στην τιμή των 1.000 δολαρίων.

Truly, an artist in every sense. Share {copyShortcut} to copy Link copied! Updated: 9:56 AM EST Nov 8, 2017 Lilian Min LAS VEGAS — 
Britney Spears may be one of the most iconic pop stars of all time, but she's also recently dabbled in the world of art. Who can forget this iconic Instagram video of her painting a diptych united by strong purples and blues, set to Mozart's "Turkish March": A post shared by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Oct 13, 2017 at 11:53am PDT Advertisement 
While surely Britney puts her paintbrush to the canvas for her own enjoyment, it turns out that she also turns her talents toward a greater good. In this case, she contributed the flower half of her 'grammed duo to Vegas Cares, an auction benefiting victims of the Las Vegas mass shooting . Getty Gabe Ginsberg 
It's safe to say that Brit's contribution helped, a lot. The painting was purchased by Robin Leach for a whopping $10,000. A post shared by John Katsilometes (@johnnykats1) on Nov 5, 2017 at 2:47pm PST 
This isn't the first time the Grammy-winner has showed her generous side. She previously donated $1,000,000 to the Nevada Childhood Cancer Foundation.

posts.title: GS25, 프리미엄 콘셉트 수입맥주로 차별화
posts.text:
예거필스너, 예거메르젠 1L 페트맥주는 맥아와 홉의 함유량이 일반 라거보다 높아 진한 맛을 느낄 것이 특징이다. <GS리테일 제공 
[한국정책신문=표윤지 기자] GS25가 수입맥주의 지속적 매출증가 속에서 새로운 콘셉트로 소비자공략에 나선다고 7일 밝혔다. 
회사는 다양한 수입맥주 맛을 경험한 소비자들의 눈높이가높아짐에 따라, 기존 수입맥주의 품질을 높이면서 새로운 콘셉트의 수입맥주를 도입하는 등 차별화를 두겠다는 방침이다. 
회사는 전년도 대비수입맥주 매출 증가율은 2015년 101.3%, 2016년 75.6%, 올해1월부터 10월까지 87.4%로 큰 폭의 증가세를 이어가고 있다고 설명했다. 
이러한 가운데,회사는 이달부터 오스트리아 프리미엄 맥주 2종 판매를 시작했다. 회사는 이와 함께 예거필스너, 예거메르젠비어는 캔이 아닌 1리터(L) 페트맥주로 그동안 편의점 수입맥주에서 찾아보기 힘들었던도입했다. 
또, 기존에 판매하던 정통 독일맥주 스테판브로이 3종도 프리미엄 맥주로리뉴얼했다. 
회사는 지난 2013년부터 독일에서 들여온 정통 독일맥주 스테판브로이 3종(라거, 필스너, 바이젠)을 판매하면서 이번에 프리미엄 콘셉트로 리뉴얼 된 상품을 선보이게 됐다고 강조했다.

posts.title: HAPPY BOOK WEEK: TYSON’S TREASURE (A SEAL’S OF HONOR WORLD NOVEL: HEROES FOR HIRE)
posts.text:
Tyson’s Treasure: A SEALs of Honor World Novel Heroes for Hire Book 11 Release Date Nov. 07, 2017 Blurb: 
Welcome to Tyson’s Treasure, book 11 in Heroes for Hire, reconnecting readers with the unforgettable men from SEALs of Honor in a new series of action-packed, page turning romantic suspense that fans have come to expect from USA TODAY Bestselling author Dale Mayer. 
Tyson lost his wife and child several years ago, and he knows it’s time to move on… So when his wife’s best friend barrels into his new life and he finds out she’s in trouble – as in serious stalker trouble – he steps up because he owes it to his late wife. Only he quickly finds out he wants to be at Kai’s side – any way he can. 
Kai has wanted Tyson for so damn long, but from the first moment her best friend saw him first, the two were like a lock and key. When Kai sets her eyes on him for the first time in years while doing a demonstration for a new training program her company developed, she realizes her feelings haven’t changed. 
But her life has changed, and she has a huge issue she doesn’t want anyone to know about. After all, she’s got a badass skill set… She can handle a stalker on her own… right? 
Or maybe not. As the two delve deeper into the Kai’s troubles, they find out things are much more complicated than they seem – and much more-deadly. EXCERPT 
Peace of mind was required to get a good night’s sleep. 
Feeling rough around the edges, Kai hopped into the shower just so she could wake up enough to start the day. A couple cups of coffee later and she was awake enough to figure out what she had on her calendar. She’d probably spend the morning in the office until meeting Ice for lunch. She glanced around her apartment and considered the emails she’d gotten. Maybe she should stop by the police station first. She didn’t want to be forgotten or her stalker file to get thrown in a corner. Maybe if they saw her face every once in a while, they’d realize how much of a person she was, not just a file or case number. That didn’t mean the cops weren’t doing their job, but she felt so helpless. 
When she’d had to deal with trouble before, she had a team beside her and orders to follow. And yet, here she was no longer part of the team, asking the police to step up and do the job her own unit would have done at her side. It felt odd and uncomfortable, and she admitted it made her feel insecure. In this new world nobody cared about her but her. At least not to the same extent. When she’d bought into the tech company, she’d been hoping it would become her new family. But then Mark had died in an accident, and everything had changed. Mark’s death had ripped away her newfound sense of security, her sense of belonging. 
While still raw from that, she’d struggled to regain her footing and to take the helm of the company without being overt about it. And then the stalker had found her. Outside of keeping watch for anyone suspicious, eyeing her cell, taking precautions, there wasn’t a whole lot she could do about him. And therein lay the problem. She wanted a target. She wanted somebody she could go after. But there was no one. 
The longer she thought about that, she’d be better off going to work an hour later and hitting the shooting range first. Her self-confidence had taken a hit with this stalker, and a surefire way of handling that was to regain control. She needed to be in control, not feel like a victim. Target practice was one of the best ways to feel empowered. Leaving the military she had also lost sparring partners. For the first time in a long time she realized maybe her skills weren’t quite as good as they should be. She needed time on the VR system herself. 
She sent Warren a quick text that she’d be an hour late to the office. She packed up and headed to the local range. She had a membership there and was one of the regular faces. As she walked in, Johnson gave her a wave. She signed the book and headed into the back. About the Author: 
Dale Mayer is a prolific multi-published writer. She’s best known for her Psychic Vision Series. Besides her romantic suspense/thrillers, Dale also writes paranormal romance and crossover young adult books in different genres. 
To go with her fiction, she writes nonfiction in many different fields with books available on resume writing, companion gardening and the US mortgage system. 
She has recently published her Career Essentials Series. 
All her books are available in print and digital format. 
And then there’s her poetry… 
My Path 
As I walk forward on my path to the future, 
I choose laughter, love, and light as my sutures, 
stitching together my lifetime of choices, 
as the essential fabric of my being rejoices 
in the love, friendships, and faith that follow 
the steps I take as I flow into my tomorrow.

thread.title: ¿Quiénes son los “perdidos”? | Dr. Charles Stanley | 11/7/17
thread.title_full: ¿Quiénes son los “perdidos”? | Dr. Charles Stanley | 11/7/17

posts.author: Trail Rook (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: ¿Quiénes son los “perdidos”? | Dr. Charles Stanley | 11/7/17
posts.text:
Lucas 19.1-10
Zaqueo trabajaba como jefe de los recaudadores de impuestos para el gobierno romano, y por su profesión era despreciado por sus coterráneos judíos. Cuando Jesús lo descubrió y le pidió visitar su casa, la multitud quedó consternada: el Señor se estaba relacionando con alguien cuya conducta le hacía pecador a los ojos de ellos. El Salvador respondió: “Porque el Hijo del Hombre vino a buscar y a salvar lo que se había perdido” (Lc 19.10).
La palabra perdido es un término bíblico que se utiliza para describir la situación espiritual de toda persona que todavía no ha recibido a Jesucristo como Salvador personal. En ese estado, una persona está separada de Dios: hay vida física, pero no conexión espiritual con el Padre celestial. Perdido no tiene nada que ver con la ubicación física; se refiere a falta de vida espiritual (Ef 2.1), cuando la mente está ciega a la verdad de Dios.
La humanidad se convirtió en pecadora por la acción desobediente del primer ser humano: Adán. Cuando él apoyó el plan de Eva y desobedeció a Dios, su naturaleza se volvió rebelde, y todas las generaciones a partir de entonces han heredado sus tendencias carnales pecaminosas. Toda persona nace en este mundo con una naturaleza que no busca a Dios (Ro 5.12).
Zaqueo era pecador por su condición perdida, no por su codiciosa profesión. La buena conducta no nos hace cristianos, ni la mala nos descalifica. El recaudador de impuestos recibió la salvación por su fe en Jesús. Al confiar en Cristo como Salvador, nosotros, al igual que Zaqueo, ya no estamos perdidos; somos hechos espiritualmente vivos. ¡Aleluya!
